name: Escape Zorgapol
description:
2nd year of university project

University: ESTG - Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão

          In Escape: Zorgapol, you play the role of Half-Face, a security guard, that must escape from the laboratory he's in. The laboratory is full of nozobs (zombie-like creatures that you must flee from or attack), weapons and heals (for you to loot) that you will find as you make your way out of that hell.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unreal Engine
Mode: Single-Player
Game Programming: Wilson SANTOS
Game Art: Bernardo MÓNICO, Hugo SILVA
